data.title: Film:James Newton Howard
data.meta_description: James Newton Howard is an eight time Academy Award-nominated American film score composer, orchestrator, and music producer. He was the composer for The Last Airbender. 2000 Malibu Road (composer) Blue Smoke (TV movie - score producer) ER (composer) Men (composer) The Fugitive (composer) Howard...
data.text:
